alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 11:41AM PST until November 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
